basic_info.title: ASUS Scholarship 2024 at Taiwan Tech University (Fully Funded)
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed
basic_info.funded_by: ASUS and the Taiwan Tech University

program_details.description:
Fully funded scholarship to study in Taiwan. The applications are open for the **ASUS Scholarship 2024** at the National Taiwan University of Science and Technology **(Taiwan Tech)**. This is a New Scholarship launched by the ASUS and the Taiwan Tech University to provide a fully funded** master’s degree** scholarship for international students. After graduation, ASUS will offer a** 2-year position at ASUS HQ, Taiwan.**

ASUS is a Taiwanese multinational computer hardware and consumer electronics company. During the scholarship program, ASUS will also offer internship programs and training related to the Job. The scholarship is open in electronics, information technology, or management-related disciplines. It’s a great opportunity. It’s an opportunity you don’t want to miss—study and work in Taiwan. More details about the ASUS Scholarship Program are given below.
participating_universities: National Taiwan University of Science and Technology

financial_coverage: The subsidy for a Return ticket for economy class airfare to Taiwan will be given.
The living allowance will be given per month.
The subsidy for Chinese language courses will be given.
additional_benefits: Students must provide course registration documents and proof of a minimum of 80% course attendance.
After graduation, a two-year position at ASUS will be offered to scholarship recipients.
During the degree program internship opportunities will be provided.

application_process: All applicants have to apply online for admission via the **online application system**.

related_programs: International Youth Conference 2024 in Yokohama, Japan (Fully Funded)
